profile.name: Aleksandras Salnik
profile.heading: Software engineer
profile.description: Hi, I am software engineer constantly seeking for improvement. Currently working on front-end skills and trying new things in React framework. At this moment I am searching for a job or internship.

projects.name: HTML to PDF converter
projects.description: This project was made using javascript, jsPDF and html2canvas. Your html code is being processed to canvas and then converted to pdf picture.

projects.name: Responsive form with validation
projects.description: This project is made using React, Redux and material-ui. With Redux the credentials are getting checked as you type and warnings are shown accordingly. On submit button success message is shown.

projects.name: To-do list
projects.description: This project is made using Javascript, CSS and HTML. Here all to-dos are saved in local storage which means, that when page is reloaded to-dos does not dissapear.
